quest.name: Following Footfalls
journal: Fufulupa needs you to assist his fellow Brass Blades.

The Brass Blades of the Rose have been charged with guarding a party of thaumaturges surveying the Footfalls. Fearing that their security is inadequate, Fufulupa bids you speak with Totoruna at the ruins and offer your assistance.
Totoruna curtly informs you that his unit does not require aid. Fufulupa's gesture appears to be both unwarranted and unwanted...

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: The Brass Blades of the Rose have need of your assistance once more, Forename!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Thaumaturges from the Ossuary are presently surveying the Footfalls for ancient relics.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: As the area is rife with wild beasts, the Horizon garrison has been charged with their security.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: But Captain Baldewyn sent only a handful of Brass Blades! Despite his assurances to the contrary, such a small unit cannot possibly be sufficient to protect our patrons.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: I would have you offer your assistance to my comrades. Pray travel to the Footfalls and speak with Totoruna.

dialogue.name: TOTORUNA
dialogue.text: A bleedin' 'venturer, come to help? I ain't heard nothin' from Cap'n Baldewyn 'bout this. He said trusted men only...

dialogue.name: TOTORUNA
dialogue.text: Anyroad, we've got this under controlâ”€an' besides, this operation ain't got nothin' to do with Fufulupa.

dialogue.name: TOTORUNA
dialogue.text: Boy's got a stick up his arse the size of a sabotender. It's no wonder the cap'n told him to stay at Horizon...
